title: IISER Thiruvananthapuram Notification 2025 - Apply Online for Project Scientist Post
description: Indian Institute of Science Education and Research Thiruvananthapuram (IISER Thiruvananthapuram) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Scientist Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.E/ M.Tech., Ph.D can grab this chance and apply for the IISER Thiruvananthapuram Notification 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested a...
